benefits.badge: The ONLY rental with all these benefits

header.title: All-inclusive packages. Total transparency. Zero surprises.
header.subtitle: Our goal is to simplify your trip: pick the exact car you want, get everything included, no hidden fees ‚Äî so you can spend time on what matters: amazing moments with your family.

premiumFleet.body: Updated, comfortable fleet inspected for your safety.

fullTank.title: Full tank

fullInsurance.title: Full insurance + liability

extraDriver.title: Free additional driver

noLines.title: No lines at pickup
